name: WorldHostingDays GmbH
membership:
Eco - eco.de
Internet Infrastructure Coalition - i2coalition.com
goal:
Over the last thirteen years WHD.global has become the largest and most successful event for the hosting and cloud services industry, that brings together leading experts and insiders for high-value networking, informative discussions, and shared experiences.

WHD.global had over 6,500 attendees from all over the world in 2016.

More than 65% of the last year?s visitors are from the upper management level.
The exciting location of a theme park in the center of Europe provides perfect facilities for business, networking and entertainment.
Additional social networking events offer great opportunities for conversations with some of the brightest minds in the industry.
All WHD events are vendor-neutral, increasing credibility and cross-industry acceptance.

WHD.global 2017 takes place March, 27-31st in Europapark, Rust, Germany.
interests: Enterprise, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trade
